description: Landon's goofy but lovable mug is reminiscent of young Forrest Gump and his 'Ah-shucks' demeannor makes him all the more fetching. He's never done anything like this before so to help him ease into his performance we chat him up a bit. He's kinda nervous; he's horny; and he loves jerking off - so he's more than eager to do the deed. And another hot thing - this boy's got the perfect pair of balls ... like 2 duck eggs in a hankie, incredible and edible. Yummy. As for the in-your-face masturbating ... that's pretty hot too!
title: Landon, Scene #01
